main event: A 12-year-old boy observed and photographed a UFO described as an inverted mushroom over Rochester, Minnesota on March 12, 1967.
interesting points: The boy initially thought it was a plane but noted it didn't move like one,Observations were made from the boy's home window,The object was visible for about 45 seconds before it shot up and out of sight,The boy took three photographs of the object,Local news reported on the sighting and included photographs, though no official photographs from the Air Force were obtained.
witness description: 12-year-old boy named Mark Ifrtchitz, who demonstrated sincerity in reporting the incident.
